message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product, and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm offering it to you for $120. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $60. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $70?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate you coming up a bit.  I can't go as low as $70, but I could meet you at $95. It's really a great product and I think you'll be happy with it.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $85?
